SELECT L.LEAD_NUM, L.LEAD_NAME, CC.CLNT_CMPNY_NAME, EC.CLNT_NAME, E.EMP_NUM, E.EMP_NAME, DECODE(CCG.GRADE_NUM, 0, 'S', 1, 'A', 2, 'B', 3, 'C', 4, 'D') AS GRADE_NAME FROM LEAD L INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_NUM = L.MNGR_EMP_NUM INNER JOIN ENTRPRS_CLNT EC ON EC.CLNT_NUM = L.CLNT_NUM INNER JOIN CLNT_CMPNY CC ON CC.CLNT_CMPNY_NUM = EC.CLNT_CMPNY_NUM INNER JOIN CLNT_CMPNY_GRADE CCG ON CCG.GRADE_NUM = CC.GRADE_NUM WHERE L.LEAD_NUM = #{leadNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALES(SALES_NUM, MNGR_EMP_NUM, LEAD_NUM) VALUES(#{ss}, #{len}, #{llnum})
mapper.select: SELECT S.SALES_NUM, L.LEAD_NUM, L.LEAD_NAME, CC.CLNT_CMPNY_NAME, EC.CLNT_NAME, E.EMP_NUM, E.EMP_NAME, TO_CHAR(S.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, DECODE(CCG.GRADE_NUM, 0, 'S', 1, 'A', 2, 'B', 3, 'C', 4, 'D') AS GRADE_NAME FROM LEAD L INNER JOIN SALES S ON S.LEAD_NUM = L.LEAD_NUM INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_NUM = L.MNGR_EMP_NUM INNER JOIN ENTRPRS_CLNT EC ON EC.CLNT_NUM = L.CLNT_NUM INNER JOIN CLNT_CMPNY CC ON CC.CLNT_CMPNY_NUM = EC.CLNT_CMPNY_NUM INNER JOIN CLNT_CMPNY_GRADE CCG ON CCG.GRADE_NUM = CC.GRADE_NUM WHERE S.SALES_NUM = #{salesNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOAN_DTL_INFO ( SALES_NUM, LOAN_CAUSE_NUM, EXPCTN_LOAN_SCALE, LOAN_HOPE_TYPE, LOAN_HOPE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{ss}, #{loanCause}, #{expctnLoanScale}, #{loanHopeType}, #{loanHopeTime})
mapper.select: SELECT S.SALES_NUM, DECODE(LDI.LOAN_CAUSE_NUM, 0, '사업확장', 1, '제품개발', 2, '토지매매', 3, '기타') AS LOAN_CAUSE_NUM, LDI.EXPCTN_LOAN_SCALE, DECODE(LDI.LOAN_HOPE_TYPE, 0, '장기대출', 1, '단기대출') AS LOAN_HOPE_TYPE, DECODE(LDI.LOAN_HOPE_TIME, 0, '근시일 내', 1, '3개월 이후', 2, '6개월 이후', 3, '1년 이후') AS LOAN_HOPE_TIME FROM SALES S LEFT OUTER JOIN LOAN_DTL_INFO LDI ON S.SALES_NUM = LDI.SALES_NUM WHERE S.SALES_NUM = #{salesNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXPCTD_BSNS_INFO ( SALES_NUM, EXPCTD_BSNS_NAME, EXPCTD_BSNS_TYPE, RMKS ) VALUES ( #{ss}, #{expctdBsnsName}, #{expctdBsnsType}, #{rmks} )
mapper.select: SELECT S.SALES_NUM, EXPCTD_BSNS_NAME, EXPCTD_BSNS_TYPE, RMKS FROM SALES S LEFT OUTER JOIN EXPCTD_BSNS_INFO EBI ON S.SALES_NUM = EBI.SALES_NUM WHERE S.SALES_NUM = #{salesNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXPCTD_BSNS_ATT_FILE ( ATT_FILE_NUM, SALES_NUM, ATT_FILE_NAME ) VALUES ( EXPCTD_BSNS_ATT_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ss}, #{attFile} )
mapper.select: SELECT S.SALES_NUM, L.LEAD_NUM, L.LEAD_NAME, CC.CLNT_CMPNY_NAME, EC.CLNT_NAME, S.MNGR_EMP_NUM, E.EMP_NAME, DECODE(CCG.GRADE_NUM, 0, 'S', 1, 'A', 2, 'B', 3, 'C', 4, 'D') AS GRADE_NAME, LDI.LOAN_CAUSE_NUM, LDI.EXPCTN_LOAN_SCALE, LDI.LOAN_HOPE_TYPE, LDI.LOAN_HOPE_TIME, EBI.EXPCTD_BSNS_NAME, EBI.EXPCTD_BSNS_TYPE, EBI.RMKS, TO_CHAR(S.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, EBAF.ATT_FILE_NUM, EBAF.ATT_FILE_NAME FROM SALES S INNER JOIN EMP E ON S.MNGR_EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM INNER JOIN LEAD L ON S.LEAD_NUM = L.LEAD_NUM INNER JOIN ENTRPRS_CLNT EC ON EC.CLNT_NUM = L.CLNT_NUM INNER JOIN CLNT_CMPNY CC ON CC.CLNT_CMPNY_NUM = EC.CLNT_CMPNY_NUM INNER JOIN CLNT_CMPNY_GRADE CCG ON CCG.GRADE_NUM = CC.GRADE_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN LOAN_DTL_INFO LDI ON LDI.SALES_NUM = S.SALES_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN EXPCTD_BSNS_INFO EBI ON EBI.SALES_NUM = S.SALES_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN EXPCTD_BSNS_ATT_FILE EBAF ON EBAF.SALES_NUM = S.SALES_NUM WHERE S.SALES_NUM = #{salesNum}
